i like playing badminton.

My dog loves the park, and he always gets excited when he sees me wearing my suit.
i am 17.
it s one of my favorite hobbies.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.
I make it a point to keep in touch with my family, even though my schedule can be hectic at times.

content.text: I'm good! Just got back from the park with my dog.
It was great, he loves playing fetch.
I'm glad to hear that! I have a garden that provides a respite from my pain.
Oh, that's nice! I'm not really a gardener, but I love plants.
I'm a graphic designer, so I like to draw and paint. I recently celebrated my birthday by creating a series of art pieces to share with my friends and family about the importance of animal welfare.
That's so cool! I'm 17, and I love to draw and paint too. I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it.
That's great! Keep practicing, and you'll get better.
What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I like to play badminton, go for walks, and read.
Those sound like great hobbies! I like to play badminton too.
Oh, that's awesome! We should play sometime.
